definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Facing an overwhelming task, Froman appealed to his Rotary club .
sentences.chinese: 面臨這麼巨大的任務，福洛曼向他的扶輪社求援。

sentences.english: If there are specific issues with unsafe driving behaviors in the neighborhood, contact the city or town to ask for help.
sentences.chinese: 如身邊存在不安全駕駛的具體事例，聯繫城鎮求援。

sentences.english: We applied to the authorities for assistance.
Tell me some places to call in case of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我一些遇事故可以打電話去求援的地方。

sentences.english: The farmer ran to the village for help.
You can send out a call for help over the radio.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過無線電發出求援信號。

sentences.english: A Yuan other place learns, maintenance is over, recourse to the send a telegraph in the home.
sentences.chinese: 阿袁外地學習，生活費用完，給家裏拍電報求援。

sentences.english: This time the generals Cheng forced to launch the entire world Mojian help.
sentences.chinese: 這時候守城的將軍被迫向整個魔劍世界發起求援。

sentences.english: USPS has issued an urgent appeal for help. Will Congress deliver?
sentences.chinese: 總局發佈緊急求援信號，國會會同意嗎？

sentences.english: Can you get help from the other clans?
sentences.chinese: 你能向其他部族求援嗎？

definition: to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to dispatch an army/to send troops
to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
to send word/to deliver a letter
